}
}

item.title: ::pure
item.dc:creator: @sexy_bobert sexy bobert
item.description:
@sexy_bobert wrote:

Ha, I’ll do it… I have a Ddsspeced source too… so w/e

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sM(“Your Now A Pure Pure Pker”);
}

item.title: ::pure
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Lol, Okay, so you’re asking us to make a command for you?
Ermmm… No.
You should learn the basic construction of a command so you can make them yourself 'cause they’re the easiest of all codes.

start with…

else if(cmd[0].equals("pure")) { CODING IN HERE! }
You’re probably still confused.
so…
Where it says CODING IN HERE…
You want to add your coding.
such as…

p.skillLvl[0] = 99; p.skillXP[0] = 13036000;
that makes your attack level 99.
So mess around with the coding… Lol.

Read full topic
